dialogues.DALE:
[1]Of course not! Who wants a pocket full of coins? Seriously. Weighs down your pants, clangs around. With all this unnecessary new security everywhere, we'll be setting off alarms left and right! 
[2]Excuse me, miss? Are you Sandra Danby

[4]Fuckin' eh. 
[5]Nice! Hot Steppa! 
[6]You think you know, chico/I know what Bo, don't know/touch them up and go - uh oh!/ Chi-chi-ching-chang!!! 
[7]Just here to check out some units. 
[8]Nope. 
[9]You owe American Express $4068 dollars. Sorry, but you've been served. 
[10]Everything! They should be able to collect garbage TWICE a week. Why not? 
[11]As a tax payer, can't I say that? Come get my garbage a bit more! Is that so f- ing crazy? I'm not asking for free beer Tuesday's or anything. And the whole city would be more aesthetically pleasing and smell better. And don't pretend you can't smell it. Ever been to New York? Great place, smells like piss, though. Twice a week,  cough  might fix that. Hold on one sec. 
[12]I need Dr. Terrence, immediately. 
[13]Dr. Edgar Terrence. You're the guy who repeatedly refused to take care of the monkey tree that spills onto your neighbors property. And now, because of that, you've been served. 
[14]Let me through, damnit.

[21]Of course. I know that. It's just...tomorrow's tight. I've got a whole bunch of cases that I can finish tomorrow. It's probably going to take me into the night. 
[22]I will. I promise. I'm not trying to avoid this, for real, I've just been crazy busy. 
[23]Pardon? 
[24]24. 
[25]Dude, you may be a teacher here, but we're about the same age, so don't get all high and mighty. It's not that weird. Frankly, it's natural. 
[26]I'll wait in the car.

[29]Yo. It's Dale. Mind if I come by and pick up some shit? 
[30]What's up, Saul. 
[31]What? 
[32]Whoa...sorry, man. someone just let me in. I- 
[33]I'll buzz next time, man. I'm real sorry. I'm just not familiar with your, uh...protocol yet. 
[34]Um...sure. 
[35]Better than that Blue Oyster weed? 
[36]What is this? It's spectacular. 
[37]So...can I get a quarter?

[39]Holy shit! What the fuck is this thing? 
[40]You can actually smoke that contraption? 
[41]Well, be careful with that thing. 
[42]Wow. So like, uh...so like, so like what do I do? 
[43]Holy... 
[44]I'm a process server. 
[45]No, process server. 
[46]I'm hired to give people papers they don't want. It's pretty much the easiest job on earth. 
[47]Well...uh, I got a totally useless degree two years ago, then I did nothing for a year, then my dad got so fed up he hooked me up. 
[48]I got it pretty sweet, though. Today? I smoked like five joints, gave out some pieces of paper, and I ate some Burger King- 
[49]Yeah man. I'd get on that shit. They're fucking mind blowing. So, then I hot- boxed my car and then...got some action from my girlfriend. 
[50]A little. She's in high school. 
[51]No, no. She's 19. 
[52]Yeah, it's awesome, although I think she's getting old enough where she's realizing I don't do much. And these high school guys these days. They're all roided out and going to Harvard. Even on my best days, I look like a fat, dumb piece of shit next to them. 
[53]Dude...you've got, like, the actual easiest job in the world. 
[54]You can actually do whatever the hell you want. You get to sleep all day and people come buy weed at night. 
[55]Sorry to hear that. 
[56]Let's see...tonight I'm going after- 
[57]Ted Jones. He forgot to pay his- 
[58]I doubt that, man. There's probably a lot of Ted Joneses's out there. 
[59]Well Saul, that was crazy. Thanks. 
[60]Oh shit on me. 
[61]...me in! Let me in! Let me in!    Let me in! It's Dale! Let m-- 
[62]...the love of shit, let me in! Pleeea- 
[63]He fucking killed him, man! 
[64]He killed him! 
[65]Yeah, man! I can't believe it. A cop! A lady, and a guy. 
[66]No! A guy! 
[67]No! A cop and a guy killed   another guy! The lady and the guy...No,   a fucking woman, a police woman, and   an old guy, shot a guy, a younger guy,   in the fucking window at Ted's house! 
[68]Which guy? 
[69]I don't fucking know. He was this big, old, grey haired guy with a gun, and he fucking took him, and he shot him! Right there in the fucking window! BAM!

[71]No! I panicked. I was having a coughing fit, I crashed, I crashed into a car. Fuck, two cars. They must've heard at least. They knew someone was there.

[146]What the fuck? Come on.

[148]It's dead.

[151]Yeah, "for real". We'll be late, but we'll get there. Then we can fix this insane situation. 
[152]Stop fucking around, man. Come on. Leave that thing alone. 
[153]So, what's this guy like? 
[154]Well, do you think he'll be there? 
[155]Dale. Nice to meet you. 
[156]I think it's    better if you don't know my last-

[158]Saul. Ask him.  
[159]Whoa, whoa! Saul, I don't think...well, Red, I don't mean to be rude but I don't think we should tell you any more than you need to know.

[161]That's why we only need to clarify one thing - nobody's called about Saul or the pineapple express or anything like that?

[212]I have to stop this. I don't know how, but don't worry. I'll keep you safe. But still, watch your back. You never know where they might be, whoever they are. 
[213]I love you.

[266]Angie, no! No! Don't you get it? I was thrown into this situation, I had no control, but I am dealing with it. This kind of thing happens, you know-

[268]Are you joking? You're actually gonna smoke marijuana?

[270]If you haven't noticed, we're not very functional when we're stoned, Saul.

[272]Fine. Smoke marijuana. But you know how "Scarface" ends. Face down, dead, in your own fuckin' water fountain. 
[273]It's not my fault! 
[274]It's marijuana's fault! 
[275]Grow up, you fucking two year old. 
[276]Maybe I am a pothead burnout, but at least I'm not the dumbest most annoying guy in the world. The only reason I ever bought weed from you was because you're shit is so good, not because you're cool. 
[277]Bullshit! I just like...liked having lots of different kinds of weed at once. 
[278]Saul! I'm sorry, man! I didn't mean all that! Saul! 
[279]Hey, uh, what's going on here?

[296]Saul, I deserved that, because I fucked you. You're right, this whole things my fault, and they only way I can make it up to you is by rescuing you, and that's why I'm here. To save my friend. 
[297]Good. `Cause I will. 
[298]We're not losers! We did that car chase. That was all you, man! You got away from the cops. I've watched, like, nine billion hours of worlds wildest police chases and I've never seen a guy get away. Not once! But you did it. You did the impossible. 
[299]Perfect! Now rub your wrists against my belt! My belt buckle'll cut the tape. Do it! This is it! 
[300]Hurry!

dialogues.SAUL:
[1]Yo? 
[2]What the fuck?!? 
[3]I didn't buzz you in. How the monkey did you get in here? 
[4]That's fucked up, man! This building is filled with fuckin' assholes. What else is the buzzer for? Fuck. 
[5]Hey, stuff your sorry's i n a sack, bro. We're always cool. It's those fuckin' jaggoffs. 
[6]Brass tacs. I've got this new bud. Unfortunately, it's a few more bones, but fortunately, it's hands down the dopest fuckin' shit I ever smoked. And I've smoked some dope fuckin' shit. 
[7]Dude. Seriously. It's like if that Blue Oyster shit and the Afghan Kush I got had a baby, and meanwhile, the craziest Northern Lights and that red-ass Espresso Snowflake had a baby, and then by some miracle those babies met, and fucked - then this would be the shit they'd birth. 
[8]Smell it. 
[9]It's called Pineapple Express. My guy Red told me it's when this Hawaiian flood takes special dirt to the weed or some shit. It's pretty scientific. And I'm the only guy in the whole city who has it. And, its only ten bones more for a quarter. 
[10]No doubt. Just let me grab my scale. 
[11]What's with the look? What? 
[12]Oh shit! The scale. Be right back. 
[13]Ah, the cross-joint. You've never seen one of these? Not surprising. They are, like, the apex of the vortex of joint engineering. NASA built the first one in the eighties. 
[14]You light all three ends at the same time, then, you smoke it as it resonates the main section, creating a "trifecta" of smoking power. It's like, three times as powerful as a normal joint. 
[15]Dude...you wanna smoke this thing with me? 
[16]I can't even light it on my own. 
[17]Alright. Firstly you light these two ends. Then I will light the tip, making the trifecta complete. Are you ready? 
[18]It's...uh, it's good to cough.  COUGH  It opens the  COUGH  capillaries...gets you twenty-five percent higher. 
[19]And that, combined with the pineapple weed, and the cross-joint  COUGH  you're a good thirty to forty times higher. I don't know the exact math, but, pff, you're pretty fucking gong-showed. You know what I mean? 
[20]It's crazy. The better the weed, the more I wish I could think of how to explain what's so good about it, but the...uh, the better it is, the less shit I can think of in total, you know? 
[21]Okay, so, like, you've been buying from me for, like, a few months now and I really gotta ask. What's with the suit? 
[22]You`re a servant? Like, a butler. 
[23]Nice, man. Where'd you get that job? 
[24]Hey man, did you get those new chicken fries? 
[25]Does she smoke pot? 
[26]That's fuckin' sweet! Ilegal love! You're like Jerry Lee Lewis. I just read his biography. 
[27]Oh. It's still cool I guess. 
[28]Whatever, man. It sounds like you got it pretty good. I wish I had a job that easy. Fuck. 
[29]Hey! You're right, man. I never thought of it like that. 
[30]That's totally true. Except tomorrow. Thanks to that bitch daylight savings, I gotta go change my grandma's clocks forward at 7am. Or 8am. I seriously can't figure it out. 
[31]Yo, so, like, what have these people done that you go after? 
[32]Dude! My guy, Red, gets his weed from a Ted Jones. He's, like, #1 supplier in town. Maybe it's him! 
[33]Yeah, but not like this one, man! He's what I want to be one day. He's like the "Jesus of Weed". So...I guess he's like Jah. Or Scarface. 
[34]No worries dude, peace. 
[35]Ha! Ha! Ha! Screech. 
[36]Fucking hell. 
[37]Hello? 
[38]Denton? Dale Denton? 
[39]...fucking, don't smoke that shit if you can't handle it. 
[40]Dude, whoa. What the fuck are- 
[41]Be quiet, man, I got neighbors- 
[42]Somebody killed somebody?!? 
[43]Somebody killed a cop, a lady and a guy? 
[44]A cop killed a guy? 
[45]Was the guy Ted? 
[46]I don't know, the old guy who shot the guy? 
[47]I heard Ted's got grey hair! 
[48]What!?! They saw you?!? Why the fuck did you come here? Did they follow you?!? 
[49]Did they follow you here!?! 
[50]But they don't know it's you? 
[51]So...they're not coming here? 
[52]Cool. So, what's your game-plan? You gonna call the cops? Cause if you do, I'd appreciate it if you left my shit out of this shit. 
[53]Did you see any blood? Was it sick? 
[54]I wonder who the guy he shot was? 
[55]Hell yeah, man. The Koreans teamed up with, like, the Vietnamese or some shit. They're crazy mother fuckers. Number two in town. Heh. Ted's cappin' the competition. Yo, you want some of this? 
[56]So, like, exactly what was the sequence of happenings? 
[57]Oh, the Pineapple Express. It's so rare it's almost a shame to smoke it, like killing a unicorn...with, like, a bomb.

[7]If the Asians have the balls to send an assassin right into my home, we can't be too cautious. The boys say Denton and Saul are Caucasian. Maybe after their assassin failed, they hired this outside guy Denton to finish the job. Also, the boys said that Saul mentioned "going to the casino." 
[8]A bloody fork. In his girlfriends house. And the blood was fresh. 
[9]Or maybe it's the Asians fucking with us. What the fuck is going on! Any luck with the cell phones? 
[10]I want to talk to the Asians. Get me Cheung's number. Now. 
[11]Cheung. It's Ted. 
[12]Cheung, I want you to call off your man Denton. I don't know what he is, a scout, assassin, and frankly I don't care. I just want him gone. I want him dead. If you do this, I'll consider it a peace offering, otherwise, you're asking for war. And just in case you forgot, I'm number one, and there's a reason for that. You've got 24 hours to reply. 
[13]This is not good. We should have this under control. We haven't heard shit from the Asians. Got these lunatics after us. Shit. 
[14]You have them? 
[15]He shot Frank? Jesus. Fuckin' Frank. 
[16]Well, we'll torture these two bastards and find out everything they know. What about the shipment? Ready to move out? 
[17]Has anyone seen my bigger knife? Do you guys hear that? 
[18]
[19]Denton!!! 
[20]Where are you, you son-of-a-bitch? 
[21]I don't know who you are, Denton, or why you're trying to ruin my life, but you're fuckin' dead!
dialogues.BUDLOFSKY:
[1]Ted? He's gone, but he was just here. I think he knew we were coming. 
[2]Why isn't he coming now? What did you say? 
[3]Than you thought. I thought it would be more than you did. I'll call Ted. 
[4]They're long gone. 
[5]Fuck! What the hell? 
[6]What the fuck is going on? 
[7]No. One sec. 
[8]Chill out, man. You're nagging isn't helping. 
[9]Yeah! 
[10]Get up. 
[11]Don't. Ted wants him. 
[12]Haven't you seen "Speed"? "Shoot the hostage". 
[13]Still worked. 
[14]Throw him in with the other guy, and everyone stay alert. Jared, go watch outside. This is fucked up. Somethings going down. 
[15]What? 
[16]You're kidding me, right? Die Hard? 
[17]Got them downstairs. 
[18]We found Saul at his grandmother's and Dale Denton busted in here like a madman, armed to the teeth, and- 
[19]Yeah, he just plugged Frank and then I disarmed him. We got `em both holed up downstairs. 
[20]We'll be good to in 10 minutes or so. 
[21]Arg...
dialogues.CAROL:
[1]Does he have something to do with our friend in there? 
[2]"Going to the casino"? I don't like that. 
[3]I'll be back in an hour with everything there is on Dale Denton. He'll be dead by the time we make our pick-up tomorrow. 
[4]A fork? 
[5]Maybe he killed her, to protect himself. 
[6]They smashed one and left the other one in the woods to distract us. Took us an hour to find it. And we found Denton's car, which was filled with all these strange disguises. These guys are for real. 
[7]Denton. 
[8]Guy drove like a mother-fucker. It was amazing. 
[9]We should probably get to the farm. 
[10]Where did you find them? 
[11]Who the fuck is this Dale Denton? 
[12]On three. 
[13]One, two, three! 
[14]You go down. I'll take care of this. 
[15]
[16]I'm a fucking cop, you moron. 
[17]Oh yeah! 
[18]Now prepare to eat shit and die-
dialogues.POLICE LIAISON:
[1]Don't move! 
[2]Don't move! This stuff hurts. What's in your hand? 
[3]Selling pot to my students isn't "decriminalized." I'm the liaison officer for this school and I just caught four students showing off handfuls of marijuana to their friends. They told me they got it back here. Put your hands up. 
[4]You call this little? 
[5]It's possible you're telling the truth. I'm going to run a check and if it turns out you don't have any priors and all you've got is this small amount of marijuana, I'll let you go with a fine. Take a seat. 
[6]Hit and run, Mr. Denton. A double, actually. You hit two parked cars two nights ago. 
[7]Ted Jones? 
[8]Are you telling me you saw Ted Jones and a police office shoot someone? 
[9]Stay calm, do as your told, I'll get you down to the station. 
[10]Oh my god! Is that blood? Oh my god! 
[11]Freeze mister! Don't even...
dialogues.ROBERT:
[1]What the hell happened to you? 
[2]What is this Angie? 
[3]He's serious? 
[4]Get the hell out of my house. 
[5]I'm getting my gun. 
[6]We bought it for a reason! 
[7]Just nobody move, okay? Except Shannon and Angie. So, you two don't move! 
[8]Baby! Get in the car quick. Angie, in the car! 
[9]You stay the fuck away from my family! 
[10]Angie, get in the car!
dialogues.SHANNON:
[1]Hi, Dale. Nice to meet you, sit down and have some couscous. Can I get you a drink? 
[2]Shannon. 
[3]I think it is a joke. 
[4]Robert! No! 
[5]What did you do, Angie?! 
[6]Robert, what's going on? 
[7]Oh my god. 
[8]Is this...for real-
dialogues.PRIVATE MILLER:
[1]Uh, I feel a little queer sir. But... It's good. Good queer. Sir. Good queer, Sir. 
[2]But...uh...even though I feel queer, Sir, I should mention that I'm also feeling quite gay...so, a little queer, but mostly gay. 
[3]This went out...Sir. 
[4]Oh...um...what was the question again? 
[5]COUGH   COUGH  Fucking shit. 
[6]Hey! What the...what are you guys doing! Let go of me! Sir!!! Sir!!! Help me!!!
